text: Aphetto was the second largest city on the Dominarian continent of Otaria . Aphetto and its nearby swamps were home to the "Raven Guild", the Cabal , wizards , and zombies . A group of ambitious mages began coordinating their efforts to steal illicit business within the city from the Cabal. Known as the Raven Guild , this group of wizard grifters, merchants, pickpockets, and spies were a significant force in Aphetto's organized crime. Aphetto became the seat of power for the Cabal Patriarch , shortly before it was destroyed by Karona . Referred to:
